attributes.action: Cap car insurance to £500 for everyone with clean histories and no accidents
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament should put a cap of £500 on what people pay for any car insurance for anyone who has a clean licence and no claims.
People with claims should be capped at £1000. 
Scrap the speeding points declarations to hike insurance prices. The rip off prices people pay are paying for car insurance is only paying off for insurance provider shareholders and directors issuing fat bonuses who use the excuse of "insurance fraud"  to justify high car insurance prices. Insurance in the EU is much lower
attributes.background: Cap car insurances so that the greedy fat car insurance providers can stop robbing people, bring insurance lower to eu standard

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about car insurance prices are a matter for insurers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Stop car insurers considering age of driver when setting insurance policies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636551
